Yes, there are several eco-friendly beauty brands that you can consider to reduce your impact on the environment. Here are some of them:

1. Lush: Lush is a popular eco-friendly beauty brand that offers a wide range of bath and body products with minimal packaging, and many of their products are refillable or come in reusable packaging.

2. Ethique: This brand specializes in solid beauty bars such as soap, shampoo, conditioner, and moisturizers that come without any plastic packaging. All of their products are vegan, cruelty-free, and made with natural ingredients.

3. Kjaer Weis: This premium makeup brand offers refillable packaging for its products, and their packaging is made with recyclable materials.

4. Tata Harper: Tata Harper produces skincare products that are made with natural, non-toxic ingredients, and their packaging is made with a mix of glass and metal, which is 100% recyclable.

5. Herbivore Botanicals: This brand offers a range of vegan skincare products made with natural ingredients, packaged in recyclable glass containers.

These are just a few examples, but there are many other eco-friendly beauty brands out there to choose from. When choosing a brand, make sure to read the ingredients and their packaging materials to ensure they align with your values.
